documents.document: @hatttiegladwell The Irish way is to just keep repeating bye, bye, bye etc. until it’s really awkward then hang up.

@Aoife_Dooley I follow you but I wouldn’t follow me cos I’m boring. Here’s some people I follow. I don’t know if you’ll like them or not but sure you can unfollow them.
@Kodaline @MalahideG Why are some people never happy when @Kodaline announce gigs? It’s never good enough for some people. #stopmoaning #moanyholes

Anyone want to please buy me even one ticket for this for Christmas. I’m mainly talking to you Robert. 😬 https://t.co/hB4BgkRBdF
@Kodaline @MalahideG Marlay gig was amazing. Malahide castle is gorgeous. Hope I can get money together for Friday.

Oh @boshea5 don’t you look dapper. You do look like you’re making your confirmation as @JenniferMaguire said this morning. Did they tell you to hold your sleeve like that or was it your own idea? ☺️ https://t.co/N6HlSvlfsG

@JenniferMaguire @boshea5 I am living to see him with a spray tan and wearing the gear. Please let him not be voted off too soon. He’s a likable fella so hopefully the public will keep him in even if he’s awful.
@AcousticTrench There’s always here on Twitter & perhaps YouTube. Was going to say Instagram but Facebook own that I think.

@marygreenwell1 @rte Oh! How annoying. My daughter conked out on the couch after saying all day ‘I’ll be able to stay awake for the whole show’ ☺️ We’ve recorded it so she can watch tomorrow.
This is the first year my daughter has actually been excited to watch #thetoyshow She’s 10! I don’t know what took her so long. We’ve even got a toy show fire lighting. https://t.co/1zATk8iXsD

@kcshowcork @Corks96FM @LATMofficial Oh I love them. I was absolutely obsessed with them from age 10. I went to see them in the RDS & when they came out on stage I burst into tears! Then my husband & I have seen them twice a few years ago.

@SharonLeavy1 I have to agree. I’ve never used a bath bomb. Not all have glitter but the ones that do would be possibly be a tad uncomfortable. 😖 I think people like seeing all the pretty swirly colours maybe. ☺️
Happy Thanksgiving to any of my American Twitter friends. #Thanksgiving

@SharonLeavy1 @AlisonSpittle I did the same, kept them for so long they just shriveled. Or if you did go crazy and use one there’d be the outer casing bit floating in the bath(or maybe our water wasn’t hot enough) Lush bath bombs are the new body shop bath pearls. ☺️
